website_summaries.verdict: Sony's thin, powerful Tap 11 tablet shows up the competition in terms of design. It's not ideal for everyone, but only a few tweaks away from being the runaway leader in this smallish category.
pros: The Sony Vaio Tap 11 has a full Core i5 CPU, but is thinner than Microsoft's similar Surface Pro 2 and weighs less
A keyboard cover and active stylus are included in the price
cons: The slender kickstand and free-floating keyboard cover don't work well on laps or other uneven work spaces

website_summaries.verdict: The Sony VAIO Flip 11 is a decent way to get an attractive convertible tablet with a brilliant screen for a nice price.
cons: Pivoting the screen can be cumbersome
Sony is selling its PC business

customer_reviews.title: Good enough for a MD
customer_reviews.text: I loved it. I'm a IM doctor and pretty tech savvy son of a computer engineer. I just use my tab for general purpose, presentation PowerPoint, case development, research with heave web browsing. For me this tab is perfect the only issue is short battery life. Is slower that surface pro but for me is just enough. No windows 10 until nov due to lack of drivers.
customer_reviews.author: Lee Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Keyboard is very weak plastic, is very slow and ...
customer_reviews.text: Keyboard is very weak plastic, is very slow and sometimes does not work at all (with the battery full.)
customer_reviews.author: FLORENCIO FONTECILLA

customer_reviews.title: Didn't last for a week.
customer_reviews.text: After 5 days my laptop stop working. This transaction gives me too much hassle. Cause i already spend over a 100 bucks for the accessories. I thought this laptop is worth buying, but it turns out a big disappointment.
customer_reviews.author: Jade Albern Buendia

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: The product is good but the status of equipment not is very good! Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Marcela Sanabria

customer_reviews.title: Battery issues is overcharged or fully uncharged.
customer_reviews.text: Product will freeze and require a hard reboot if battery is overcharged or fully uncharged. Sony is aware of this fault and happy to help customers take apart the computer to find the place to put a pin into to reset the laptop. Not a great computer for a teenager.
customer_reviews.author: GO'C

customer_reviews.title: Nice feature, less-than-mediocre execution
customer_reviews.text: Bought tablet to replace laptop and physical notebooks at work. Don't know if it's Windows 8 or Sony, but to get full use out of apps, PDF documents, Google maps, etc. you have to use the stylus vs. just using your fingers. There are phantom clicks on the screen which will switch windows, minimize and even close apps, browser windows, and folders. Screen will randomly not accept touch commands either from the finger or stylus. Orientation was stuck in portrait until I changed the settings in Control Panel. Just a subpar product overall. The inherent kickstand feature is nice, the magnetic keyboard is efficient, and the size of the screen is large. Will be going back to a laptop ASAP.
customer_reviews.author: Kenztheninja

customer_reviews.title: The keyboard only worked for 2 weeks and it seems ...
customer_reviews.text: The keyboard only worked for 2 weeks and it seems not to have any warranty by Sony. The seller barely provides information and/or takes any responsiblitiy regarding the product.
customer_reviews.author: gabriel

customer_reviews.title: ... some getting used to but certainly as advertised and excellent
customer_reviews.text: Just takes some getting used to but certainly as advertised and excellent pricing
customer_reviews.author: Jack

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent machine. Works just as described. Very thin and light. Digital pen is very useful.
customer_reviews.author: BYONG NAM YOON

customer_reviews.title: Amazon's customer service was amazing in helping me return this item
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy. Nothing but problems. Amazon's customer service was amazing in helping me return this item. 5+ stars for Amazon Customer Service!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sony, again, surprises positively!
customer_reviews.text: This product is one of the best I've ever purchased. The technology and quality adopted to develop the design and the content of Sony products are always amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos Henrique Corrêa de Virgiliis

customer_reviews.title: it is nice, i like it
customer_reviews.text: it is nice, i like it, except the kepboard, out of power during short time, and also the USB port and the pen-cover.
customer_reviews.author: tuyangjun

customer_reviews.title: Returned Within 72 Hours
customer_reviews.text: There's a problem apparently with Windows 8.1 and the drivers that Intel and/or Microsoft have put out. The problem is that computer has great difficulty connection via the wi-fi and if you can get connected you can't stay connected. I finally after several days was able to stay connected to download the latest updates but the problem persisted. I got a HP ultrabook and had the same experience...so it must be the software. When you go on the Microsoft forums there are seemingly thousands and thousands of similar complaints. Don't buy one until the problem is resolved. BUT, the machine is really a spectular design with gorgeous functionality...too bad it doesn't work.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry

customer_reviews.title: BAD JUNK JUNK JUNK
customer_reviews.text: TERRIBLE product. keyboard stopped working, very slow memory; can't operate basic applications. since november, have used it no more than 3-4 hours total as it is such junk. i recommend you not by from this vendor. go elsewhere; try a store. delivery time was terrible too.
customer_reviews.author: geegee

customer_reviews.title: so disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: s.... L .... o..... w.... rea......llllyy slow. like seriously - really slow. impossible to use. cant even read properly. plus - no russian input ?? wtf
customer_reviews.author: Andrei

customer_reviews.title: very nice
customer_reviews.text: It is everything you want yet the Only drawback is that it has no 3G, If you are buying the i5.
customer_reviews.author: Hesham

customer_reviews.title: hey seller, i live in vietnam and i bought ...
customer_reviews.text: hey seller, i live in vietnam and i bought this laptop in usa a month ago. Two day ago, my uncle live in usa back to vietnam and give me it's. when i boot up it, i don't have any problem, but when i charged the battery. I have a proplem, the battery doesn't getting charged. Then i called sony vaio in vietnam, they talk my battery maybe have been damaged. this is a rare case however I bought it in usa so I'm not warranty battery. I suggest you pay for my warranty
customer_reviews.author: riri

customer_reviews.title: failed to power up
customer_reviews.text: I used this for less than 24 hours and it then failed to power up. After an hour on the Sony help line, the tech gave up and told me to return it.
customer_reviews.author: CAK123

customer_reviews.title: More tablet than laptop
customer_reviews.text: I am using this for last couple months. Pros: Looking pretty. Overall look is good. Display is impressive with 1080p Triluminius Cons: Keboard cannot be charged without closing it as lid. Pen holder covering the USB/HDMI ports is quite annoying When you fold keyboard with the tablet, it is not quite stuck well. It may easily slip during movement and sliding into the bag. Heat and noise from the ventilation is quite high and annoying some times.
customer_reviews.author: Siva

customer_reviews.title: I also wanted to like this tablet
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to upgrade from my Sony Vaio netbook. I was hoping the tablet feature would maķè it easier to document my treatment notes at work. I feel the keyboard charging on the screen is an issue, and it does freqquuently lose connectability. The mouse skips arround, so I'm typing in the wrong places. But the worst thing is that the wifi antenna is weak because i can get a signal on my old netbook, but not the Tap 11. I even bought an antenna to boost the signal, which did not work. I'm still using my netbook.
customer_reviews.author: SRM

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful designed
customer_reviews.text: Looking for a laptop replacement with superior screen display and easy to use. This tablet offers portability along with comfort in web surfing, emailing and movie watching. Have used daily for three months with no problems or issues. Have little need for wireless keyboard which serves a cover. Hard to access USB port since stylus holder clip covers the slot.
customer_reviews.author: jorge

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Craftsmanship
customer_reviews.text: Sony's VAIO Tap 11 is a very stable laptop, built for light to medium tasks like document processing and browsing the Internet. It is a capable laptop that churns out bright colors and utilizes touchscreen technology, which makes the unit versatile as a tablet as well. When combined, it's a great device that can hold out on its own.
customer_reviews.author: jean abercrombie

customer_reviews.title: Spend your money elsewhere!
customer_reviews.text: Worst tablet, EVER. Total waste of those 4GB of RAM. The CPU it's incredible slow. I'm struglling with a damn word file for hours. Multiple instances ? Don't you even dream about it!!!
customer_reviews.author: ivan

customer_reviews.title: Awesome machines, runs windows 10 great
customer_reviews.text: Had it for two years. I am a power user. Awesome machines, runs windows 10 great. Keyboard recharging has NEVER been an issue, even though when I first got it I assumed it would be, Battery life is about 5 hours.......
customer_reviews.author: Andrzej

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality lets the product down
customer_reviews.text: Build quality is poor, the USB cover falls off from day 1 and is very annoying. Got a blue line running down the screen now, back ti Sony for repair. 16:9 is a good aspect ratio for movies but not great for everything else. Kick stand is an inch wide so won't sit on your lap. Basically do not buy Sony, they once had a reputation for quality but sadly not any more.
customer_reviews.author: MikeyBoyd

customer_reviews.title: The battery stopped working only 2 months after buying it.
customer_reviews.text: The battery got corrupted only 2 months after buying it. Literally won't even turn on! Total lemon. ZERO stars.
customer_reviews.author: Navdeep Hehar

customer_reviews.title: Good tablet! However
customer_reviews.text: Good tablet! However, you will not find assesories for it: case, battery, screen replacement, adapter...Nothing.. So if something happens to your tablet, you are out of luck. The Sony website has it discontinued and they too have no assesories for it. Not a wise choice. Buy another tablet similar.
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn't buy again
customer_reviews.text: Very annoying because it has fan problems to the point where my laptop would just shut down randomly and reboot again. I may have two or three applications open and this thing sounds like a Jet engine. Very annoying when i have to work around my bosses and they stare at it like WTF.. Got so bad to the point when i had to start using my Dell 630 laptop because this SONY annoyed the hell out of everybody around me..
customer_reviews.author: Kevin1

customer_reviews.title: Trying hard not to get mad
customer_reviews.text: Two weeks in and everything was fine. Ran all the required updates and AOK. Added personal version of corporate Symantec as per our IT group and all was fine. Next day went to turn on to updgrade to 8.1 and nothing. Zilch. No start. Searched Sony online for help and useless. They list problem on troubleshooter but the information is for a different model and the procedure is irrelevant. Now have to take it to some service center and get them to help me turn it on. Bought Sony so I would not have to deal with incompetent technical flaws. Fool me once...
customer_reviews.author: S. McCabe

customer_reviews.title: This model uses an older cpu and costlier than sony's discounted price
customer_reviews.text: The version of VAIO Tap 11 shown here uses the older 3rd generation intel processor (prefer the model with newer 4th gen CPU if you can afford it), and is available at sony.com for 699$ as of today after a $100 discount (Jan 28th 2013).
customer_reviews.author: Anand

customer_reviews.title: Avoid
customer_reviews.text: My Sony Vaio Tap 11 could not power on after 9 days. The Servicd Centre could not reset and had to leave it for a technical assessment that will take a week. A lemon. If I could give it a zero, I would.
customer_reviews.author: Yeo Teck Guan

customer_reviews.title: very bad customer service
customer_reviews.text: This was the worst lap top i had in my life, very bad customer service I am not gonna buy any Sony products in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Hazem M.

product_meta.title: Sony 11.6" VAIO Tap 11 Touchscreen Laptop 4GB 128GB | SVT11213CXB
product_meta.description: Get more options at your fingertips with this Sony VAIO convertible laptop. The magnetic, detachable keyboard allows you to use your device in tablet or PC mode, and a high-definition touch screen lets you easily browse the Web, watch videos and flip through photos on a stunning display.

specifications.Series: Sony 11.6" VAIO Tap 11 Touchscreen Laptop 4GB 128GB | SVT11213CXB
